block.p: FLYNN-Mary (Kelley), 94, died Thursday, August 3 in Burlington, VT. Surviving are daughters Mary Kaudern (Bertil) of Pearl River, NY; Ann Flyntz (John) of Sparta, NJ; Rita Villa of Burlington, VT; and sister, Betty Lagrua of VA. Predeceased by husband Daniel Flynn in 1975. A Mass, August 11th at 11:00AM in Epiphany Church, Second Avenue, NYC. Burial in Holy Cross Cemetery, North Arlington, NJ. Hours are Thursday 68:00PM at Andrett Funeral Home, Second Avenue, NYC. Memorials may be made to Covenant House.
